title: The Family of a Victim of the Seoul Crowd Surge Tried Her Phone for Hours
description: Shin Su-Bin was out celebrating Halloween with friends when her father saw reports of the deadly crush.
dc:creator: Lee Su-Hyun

media:content.media:credit: Chang W. Lee/The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Hannam Community Center on Sunday. People have been going to the center to find out about their loved ones after the crowd surge in the Itaewon neighborhood of Seoul.
